subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Matteo Manassero, a 17-year-old Italian, shot a seven-under 64 to take a one-stroke lead after the first round of the European Masters in Crans-sur-Sierre, Switzerland. Manassero turned pro in May.
snippet: Matteo Manassero, a 17-year-old Italian, shot a seven-under 64 to take a one-stroke lead after the first round of the European Masters in Crans-sur-Sierre, Switzerland. Manassero turned pro in May.
